website_summaries.verdict: While this cloth does not remove 100 % of makeup as claimed, it's pretty close. And since it's reusable, it saves both money AND space in the landfill.
pros: Perfect for travel or gym bag
Remove your makeup with water and this cloth
Removes waterproof eyeliner and mascara, HD makeup and much more
No stains will remain after washing
Cloth finished with a soft, hand-sewn sateen edge
cons: Some customers said the cloth did not remove their waterproof mascara
Dark color makes it hard to see where you've already used the cloth

customer_reviews.title: Call Herminone Granger, because she wants her magic make up eraser back.
customer_reviews.text: What kind of magic is this thing???? It seriously takes off 98% of my makeup with JUST WATER. It's crazy. When I use it I still will have very small remnants of eye makeup (mascara or eyeliner) but for the most part it takes like 98% of make-up off. I just use a little lotion or coconut oil to remove the last bits of eye makeup. It does have to be soaked to work really well, and I did wash mine by hand the first time before using it. But it even takes off full face WATERPROOF make-up!!!! Call Herminone Granger, because she wants her magic make up eraser back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd MakeUp Eraser - I love them. PERFECT for travel because you don't need ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd MakeUp Eraser - I love them. PERFECT for travel because you don't need to pack cleanser. My only suggestion is maybe get lighter colors so you can see where you've already used the towel. This purple is pretty but doesn't show your makeup like the pink does.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I bought because the product description specifically states it takes off waterproof mascara and eyeliner which I often wear and normally take off with eye make up remover on a cotton pad. I was looking forward to a more comfortable process... nope. This is simply a 100% polyester washcloth, nothing special. It requires much more rubbing to get waterproof mascara off and caused more irritation. I could get the same results from a washcloth in my linen closet.
customer_reviews.author: homeslice614

customer_reviews.title: The best product I purchased this year
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. Seriously. All you do is add water and it erases ALL makeup off of your face gently. The other side also gently exfoliates. I’ve wasted so much money over this years on makeup wipes that cause my face to get greasy and break out. I haven’t broken out at all since switching over to MUE (it’s been about 6 months now). All I do is throw it in the wash each week and it’s good as new again. This seriously erases all makeup and products easily, gently, and quickly. I’ll never go back to makeup wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: great skincare
customer_reviews.text: So i use this with my micellar water on the nights where i'm just too tired after work to wash my face and let me tell you, it works. it makes my skkin feel nice and it doesn't feel like i'm scraping at my eyes to get all the mascara and eyeliner and all that other junk off. it's smooth and soft and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective for Waterproof Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wash cloth if you want to travel with it. If you expect it to remove waterproof mascara...FORGET it! It doesn’t work. You have to scrub your eyes until they are raw and then you end up with random mascara clumps all over your face. There is also residual mascara under your eyes and on your lashes. It creates more inconvenience rather than solving a problem. I imagine it probably works well in regular mascara though.
customer_reviews.author: NancyAyn

customer_reviews.title: SOLD
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. Now I'm sold. I'm considering buying another one for my mom's house, since I spend the night there so much. I can't go back to conventional makeup removers. I can't. I WON'T. It made me cringe when I had to use baby wash to wash my face the last time I was at my mom's because I forgot my eraser. I thought it was a scam, but figured I would try it. What do I have to lose? I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bostic

customer_reviews.title: How does it do that?
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law gave me one of these a year ago, and I was skeptical. I quickly became a fan! This cloth is amazing for getting ALL your makeup off, even the waterproof mascara. I don't know how these work exactly, but it only takes a little water....no cleanser needed. Perfect for traveling too! Easily washes out for another use. Do yourself a favor though and buy the darker colors. it doesn't stain easily, but time and usage does discolor the lighter colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: but I will agree with other posters that I have to pull on my eyelid pretty hard to get all the eyeliner and mascara off
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but I will agree with other posters that I have to pull on my eyelid pretty hard to get all the eyeliner and mascara off. I feel like this tugging is doing more damage to my skin than just leaving the makeup on in the first place..
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the make up eraser. This product saves me so much money. I no longer buy makeup remover or the wipes. It is more eco friendly as i can just wash the eraser in the wash. I love that you can just throw it in your bags for traveling. I take it with a me in my carry on bag, there is no trouble getting through airport security since there is no liquid in the travel.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Back to regular washing
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is says. Cleans face from makeup with ease. Downside is that it feels very abrasive on my skin and leaves a bit of a burning sensation. I followed the instructions and washed before use. It also would leave pieces of the material stuck to my face. I have one as a gift to a friend who says the same thing happened with her. Back to regular washing
customer_reviews.author: Shauneezy

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews to often but I’m blown away by how amazing these are
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews to often but I’m blown away by how amazing these are!!! I need everyone to know about them! Just water and it’s like magic and I’m a skeptic about everything!!!! I was not paid to write this and literally used them 1 hour ago for the first time and I will never use anything else AGAIN!!! Thank you to the company for these they are amazing 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Marylou vanhintum

customer_reviews.title: OMG IT WORKS FABULOUSLY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. If I could give it 10 stars I would. It literally takes my makeup off in just a few swipes and I wear full makeup. I am 49 and I wear foundation, concealer to mascara and everything in between. My skin felt great afterwards and I no longer have to use makeup wipes, which I hate. For 20.00 it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: No More Raccoon eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I always had trouble getting my mascara/black eye liner off of my under eye area (SENSITIVE) and eyelid area with out scrubbing, and that I don't think was helping my wrinkles! I purchased this on the recommendation of a friend, and it works just as advertised, with only water will remove all my makeup, and doesn't require scrubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much, I bought another one
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these with a subscription box and I had my doubts about makeup removal. It is a miracle worker. My eye makeup remover does not do what this cloth does. It removes my waterproof mascara so easily without a mess. I also like that it's reusable. It washes and dries very easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SDA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to wear makeup because no matter what I use to take it off still leaves mascara under my eyes. I was shocked to see how easily this took it off and nothing to scrub off after. It almost suctions to your face to take it off so easily. Will be buying as gifts for my teenage girls!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Did not think I could love a tiny towel so much!
customer_reviews.text: What do you do if you want to be environmentally conscious AND hate getting soap in your eyes? You buy this MakeUp Eraser towel! My husband laughed at me: "Isn't that just a towel?" No sir, it is magic! Removes all my eye makeup and I don't have soapy burning eyes AND there is wasted wipe to throw in the trash. Perfect solution. I wash it once a week (I don't wear makeup every day) and viola! It is brand new again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine White

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This this is awesome! I have tried several different make up remover cloths and this one wins by far! My only complaint is the price. There are much much cheaper options. Also needs to be washed at least twice before use or you will have little fuzzies all over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Fowler

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these in my FabFit box, and loved it so much I had to get a 2nd one. This makeup eraser is exactly that - it erases makeup. I used to have problems getting my eyeliner off; it would smear and I'd look like a raccoon, but not with this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Higlaud

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was skeptical when I bought this, but am pleased to say it actually does work just as it says. I'll definitely pack this when traveling so I don't mess up hotel towels or have to deal with liquid make up remover. Works great, I'll definitely recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Abrasive!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very abrasive. I used it to remove my mascara and beneath my eyes were red and painful. I actually had to chisel off the mascara. Would definitely not reccomend. Addendum: one day after writing this review I had a scab underneath my eye from the abrasiveness. I felt I needed to add this as a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Dash's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Handy product especially for those who prefer not to use chemicals. It works as expected. I bought one for our two daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Nan011

customer_reviews.title: A great washcloth
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this exactly according to the package but I did not find it to be a great make up remover. It did take some off, but I ended up using my make up reover to get the rest off. I do like how soft this is and will continue to use as a wash cloth,
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well but if you have waterproof mascara on then you have to work a little harder to get it off. It does not take it all off. I usually have to finish off with my Mary Kay eye makeup remover to remove the remainder of the waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Money

customer_reviews.title: Saves Time and Energy
customer_reviews.text: These are a game-changer for me. I’m disabled, so I often don’t have the energy to wear makeup if it means I have to spend a half hour scrubbing it all off at the end of the day. This gets all my makeup off within a minute, if that. Now I can wear makeup again without worrying about how I’m gonna get it all off!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I still feel like I have some make up on left over
customer_reviews.text: My aunt loves this for cleaning her face every night and says she feels so clean with just it and water, I still feel like I have some make up on left over. It also doesn't work on mascara, and after each scrubbing you'll want to use a little soap to clean the cloth itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL THING!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Makeup Eraser before bought from Ricky's NYC and this one right here aint it! I used it last night and it was a struggle taking off my makeup, especially the mascara and eye shadow, which with the real one it comes all off in one wipe easily. Also the one I received was significantly bigger than the original which I also questioned. Makes sense that most of the low star reviews are saying it doesn't work because it isn't the real one. Returning this and getting the official one elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This item was pretty good, soft on the face it holds soap actually, you don't even need so but I like to use soap and it's very very soft. But it does take your makeup off!
customer_reviews.author: Stanly The Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for her birthday. She loves it. She says it works fantastically at removing makeup, even mascara and eyeliner with out tugging at delicate eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: My aunt bought me one of these a few years back and I love it! No need for any other make up remover wipes because these are the best! Literally wet it and wipe all your makeup off, even the waterproof stuff! I've had mine for atleast 4 years now and finally decided to buy another one. You can put it in the wash too!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany DiMarco

customer_reviews.title: 💜💜💜
customer_reviews.text: This is my favor cloth by far, not only is it a darker color so it doesn't stain at all but it somehow seems thicker/fluffier than my others. I love the way it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah V

customer_reviews.title: Like a washcloth but not - and works!
customer_reviews.text: This works. I was using disposable makeup removal cloths and then washing my face with a washcloth. Washcloths were staining. I found this and it works great! Bought one for my daughter too. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RobLee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing makeup eraser
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this works with just water, but it is amazing! I don't wear a lot of makeup, but I do wear waterproof mascara and eyeliner. This has no problem taking it off - and it's a great savings from buying the makeup removing wipes that I used to buy. No more - now I use this exclusively to take off my makeup every night.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at removing makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this towel was a gimmick at first, but then I was sent a trial size. I was blown away at how effective this is at removing my makeup. Even my stubborn waterproof mascara. It's perfect for travel, since you only need to pack one thing. But I also use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product works but it does and very well w/o chemicals (which for someone like me with so many allergies) is amazing. It doesn’t just sort of work, it works great... like removes waterproof makeup works.
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna M. Dagenais

customer_reviews.title: Ideal concept.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the concept of this cloth. It does indeed remove make up, even long wear eye makeup. I'm a tad disappointed that you have to rub so hard on the delicate eye tissue...I was hoping for less friction I guess. I dont travel with it...mostly because it takes up so much space.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times so far. Seems to work. I like that it is durable and doesn’t require any special care.
customer_reviews.author: flutiemusix

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I expected better after reading the reviews, but it did not get rid of waterproof mascara at all. It is much easier to use other products.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous and really works. I’m happy to get away from putting anything on my skin I don’t have to
customer_reviews.author: Rosie2012

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was skeptical about it, but I can’t use any eye make up remover since it’s bothering my eyes. That cloth is absolutely amazing! It absolutely works!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Works so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It actually takes your makeup off with just water. I got the dark purple so that it wouldn't get stained. Everything washes out really easily. It makes taking makeup off so so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well this works, even with waterproof mascara. I'm planning on getting more as gifts for every make-up-wearing friend and family member!
customer_reviews.author: KSL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome towel
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect think to take makeup off with. I’ve never had a problem with it. Even after multiple washes it works great
customer_reviews.author: Laney Eggs

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I’m very skeptical of amazon trends. This works just as advertised. Recommend fully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a magic wand for removing makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dubious, but this works like a charm! Removes all my makeup with just a quick wipe down. It washes up spectacularly in the wash and I hang it to dry. I throw it in with the towels with no fabric softener and it comes out looking brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Warmerdam

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wish they made finger size version for cleaning eyelid area.
customer_reviews.author: Meri D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase. I have very sensitive skin, and most makeup remover breaks me out. You need no cleanser with this cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Shop2much

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. The material sheds a lot so my face has purple fuzz after i wash it. It’s not anything amazing. You could use a regular towel.
customer_reviews.author: hdawg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at taking off all traces of mascara with just water. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: a liss

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but does not work as intended for my daughter. It does not remove makeup without actually washing her face. Still nice to have as a wash cloth or towel as it is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Angie R

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters for Christmas. This thing is amazing! It works exactly as I saw advertised online. Just wet it with a little water and it removes ALL makeup. The fabric is soft on the skin, not abrasive at all. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Novak

customer_reviews.title: TRULY MAGICAL!
customer_reviews.text: This. Thing. Is. MAGIC. It tastes all of my makeup off so well!! And all you have to do is throw it in with a load of laundry. Only downside is if you don't wash it at least once a week, it gets pretty grubby. Still, for how well it works and the fact that it reduces waste (goodbye cottonballs and single use wipes!), it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves purple fuzz on my face!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It really works removing all signs of make up. However, no matter how many times I wash it, it continues to leave purple fuzz on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McNair

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all I can say! Literally wipes all your makeup away!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my makeup wipes
customer_reviews.text: Friend suggested I get one of these to replace my make up wipes and it didn't disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Gave one of these to my daughter and my daughter-in-law as part of their Christmas. They love it! Happy to not have to keep buying the disposable makeup remover cloths. They love how it removes their makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Miracle wash cloth
customer_reviews.text: Love my makeup remover. Noticed a difference within few days. Definite that I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy#4

customer_reviews.title: Softer than any washcloth
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Makeup Erasers and constantly rotate through them. They are so much softer than a washcloth and work wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: framedfrosting

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loovvveee this product! Waaay better than make up removal wipes! Gets makeup off my face after just a few wipes

customer_reviews.title: Water gets all the makeup off!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY does remove make with just water. Soft as well.

customer_reviews.title: Makes taking make up off easy
customer_reviews.text: i love the make-up eraser. It makes taking your make-up off easy. This make my 2nd one
customer_reviews.author: Laminda Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: It’s very obvious that it’s a fake make up eraser. Since I already have one I’m only doing this review to show people that haven’t had one before what a real one should look like.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Saving lots of money on makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: Very badly made after the first wash the border fell apart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this works but it does! It’s magic.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is amazed at how well this worked. Great purchase and she would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I take when I travel and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I take when I travel and they dry overnight. Takes makeup off perfectly (still use cleanser). Travel size are just right - I cut the larger ones in half. Throw them in washer and dryer. Have given as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It will save me so much money on wipes. Hard to travel with though because it does need washed 1-2 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Warthan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This deserves 105 stars! I love this cloth! It gets all of my make up off with water alone. I will continue to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan F.

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing!! Arrived quickly and highly recommend if you ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing!! Arrived quickly and highly recommend if you want a facewash free way to take off your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle vG

customer_reviews.title: Makeup is 100% removed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Truly removes makeup better than cotton pads and eye makeup remover. I wish I knew of this product sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I like it. To be honest though
customer_reviews.text: I like it. To be honest though, it's not really different from a baby washcloth. It's about the size of a small hand towel. Is it worth the price? I'd say no. If it were half the price I'd be better pleased about it. It does what it says it will.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paskell

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best discovery of 2019 for me I recommend it to everyone , i feel like Mulan when she wipes off her makeup with her sleeve in the movie , it works!
customer_reviews.author: Raeanna bowman-poole

customer_reviews.title: All my makeup comes right off! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for your face!! I love that I can wash it and save the environment at the same time. Super easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: It actually works!! I was skeptical when I went to order it but I have been pleasantly surprised. I don't wear a lot of make up but I do wear waterproof eyeliner and mascara. I have found that really soaking the towel with fairly hot water takes the make up off with minimal scrubbing. My biggest recommendation is that you should buy two of them so you can rotate them through. After one or two uses if you don't wring it out a LOT then it will smell pretty quickly. Other than that I have recommended this product to many of my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised, these really work!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had found these years ago. My face has never felt so clean. These are actually amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Still looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack in Sept 2018 and it's now February and you'd never know I've owned it that long. I get compliments all the time on the design and it's super functional. Love this diaper bag!!

customer_reviews.title: Super item
customer_reviews.text: This is a super item. I can't believe how well it works.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I've purchased this lots awesome takes off makeup super easy

customer_reviews.text: Really works...I gave one as a Christmas gift and bought an extra for my travel bag. Worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it's advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Works just like it's advertised! Don't buy the cheap version, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. Even removes sharpie... instead of wasting money on make up remover/wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these products. So easy to take off my makeup at night.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical, but this thing digs deep and cleans so well, much better than make up wipes.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: This product is extremely rough on the skin. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely rough on the skin. It drags across it as you wipe - I just think of what we have been told a million times by our Mother's and countless magazines...do NOT tug on your skin especially around your eyes! This product TUGS hard on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: D.Sisler

product_meta.title: Makeup Eraser, Queen Purple
product_meta.description:
Erase ALL makeup with JUST water! MakeUp Eraser is made up of millions of tiny hairlike fibers that stand straight up and when wet, work together to reach and suction all makeup, dirt and oil out of each individual pore. Bath towels are typically woven in a loop or pile that is absorbent and general microfiber cloths are made with a conjugation of polyester, polyamide, and polypropylene that can be abrasive to the skin. The Original MakeUp Eraser is a premium, plush, polyester blend designed for sensitive skin and dermatologist approved.

MAKEUP ERASER IS DEDICATED TO CREATING THE MOST SUSTAINABLE MAKEUP REMOVAL PRODUCT IN THE WORLD. DRIVEN BY MILLENNIALS THAT BELIEVE WE CAN ELIMINATE THE 3RD MOST WASTEFUL PRODUCT IN THE WORLD: WIPES.
.
